newsitem.title: USA: Blue-chip stocks end lower for fourth straight day.
newsitem.headline: Blue-chip stocks end lower for fourth straight day.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks extended their losing streak to a fourth session Thursday as the Dow Jones industrial average closed below 6,000 for the first time in two weeks as investors continued to take profits.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow ended 43.98 points lower at 5,992.48. In the broader market, declining issues led advances 12-10 on active volume of 418 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
